text: The Death of Poor Joe is a 1901 British silent drama movie directed by George Albert SmithThe Death of Poor JoeTHE DEATH OF POOR JOE and stars Laura Bayley and Tom Green. ==Actors== * Laura Bayley as Joe * Tom Green as the policeman ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1901 movies Category:1900s drama movies Category:British drama movies Category:British silent movies
title: The Death of Poor Joe
